sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SHIFFNAL, a town of the hundred of Brimstrey, in the county of Salop, 143 miles from London. It is a small place, of no trade except that arising from its being on the great post-road from London to Holyhead. There is a market on Friday. The population amountcd in 1821 to 4411, and in 1831 to 4779.
